columns.name: reserved_db_instance_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the reservation.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the reserved DB Instance.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the reserved DB instance.

columns.name: class
columns.description: The DB instance class for the reserved DB instance.

columns.name: currency_code
columns.description: The currency code for the reserved DB instance.

columns.name: db_instance_count
columns.description: The number of reserved DB instances.

columns.name: duration
columns.description: The duration of the reservation in seconds.

columns.name: fixed_price
columns.description: The fixed price charged for this reserved DB instance.

columns.name: lease_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the lease associated with the reserved DB instance.

columns.name: multi_az
columns.description: Indicates if the reservation applies to Multi-AZ deployments.

columns.name: offering_type
columns.description: The offering type of this reserved DB instance.

columns.name: product_description
columns.description: The description of the reserved DB instance.

columns.name: usage_price
columns.description: The hourly price charged for this reserved DB instance.

columns.name: recurring_charges
columns.description: The recurring price charged to run this reserved DB instance.
